author: jeffbi
body:
Addresses issue #4145

Previously with .NET Core, `FileNotFoundException` would be thrown if a file was deleted during an enumeration, and that issue was fixed by #3806. That behavior is changed in newer .NET Core to align with full .NET. So the tests hooks and tests added in #3806 is unneeded now and thus removed.
title: Remove test hooks and tests for files being deleted or renamed during enumeration
